type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Mob Origins](https://moborigins.ultrusmods.me/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Time Since Rest

---

Checks how long the player has been sleeping, time is in ticks.

---

### Example
```json
{
        "entity_condition": {
            "type": "moborigins:time_since_rest",
            "comparison": "greater_than",
            "compare_to": 100
        }
    }
```
Checks how long the player has been sleeping.
